ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (1608 – Disodium Ethylenediaminetetraacetate)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1608 - DISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINETETRAACETATE) in order to use disodium ethylenediaminetetraacetate (disodium EDTA) as a sequestering agent in edible coatings for sausages.
